plant_explosives.name: Plant Explosives
plant_explosives.setup_text: After deployment, each non-peon model in play gains an Explosive token
plant_explosives.rules_text: Interact to remove Explosive token, place marker within 1" of self Interact to remove marker; gain Explosive token if you don't have one After a model with Explosive token is killed, the model that killed it makes a neutral Strategy marker within 1" of killed model, if able     Models may move on top of Strategy markers
plant_explosives.scoring_text: Player with more friendly Strategy Markers completely on enemy table half scores 1 VP
plant_explosives.additional_vp_text: Have 2 friendly Strategy Markers in (not completely within) opponent's deployment zone

boundary_dispute.name: Boundary Dispute
boundary_dispute.setup_text: Each player places 3 friendly Strategy Markers in their deployment zone, at least 6" apart
boundary_dispute.rules_text: Interact with Strategy marker to place it within 6" of its current location, not in base contact with any model(s) After scoring, player with fewer cumulative Strategy VP may select one friendly Strategy marker and place it within 4" of current location, not in base contact with any model(s)
boundary_dispute.scoring_text: Player with more friendly Strategy Markers completely on enemy table half scores 1 VP
boundary_dispute.additional_vp_text: Markers completely in enemy deployment zone count as 2 markers

recover_evidence.name: Recover Evidence
recover_evidence.setup_text: Each player makes 1 friendly Strategy Marker completely on enemy table half
recover_evidence.rules_text: Interact with friendly Strategy marker to remove it and put it onto that crew's crew card     After a model is killed by the enemy crew, the enemy makes a Strategy marker within 3" of the killed model Models may move on top of Strategy markers
recover_evidence.scoring_text: Player with more Strategy Markers on their crew card scores 1 VP
recover_evidence.additional_vp_text: Remove friendly Scheme Markers equal to turn number from within 1" of terrain within 6" of enemy deployment zone

informants.name: Informants
informants.setup_text: Place markers at centerpoint, 10" east and west of center on centerline, then each player places 1 marker in center of one table quarter on their side
informants.rules_text: Count models without Summon tokens within 2" of marker  Player with fewer cumulative VP may move up to 2 Strategy markers, placing each within 3" of its current location, not in base contact with any model(s), not within 8" of any other Strategy marker(s)
informants.scoring_text: Player controlling most Strategy Markers scores 1 VP

breakthrough.name: Breakthrough
breakthrough.reveal_condition: Remove 1 friendly Scheme Marker from within opponent's Deployment Zone with no enemy within 2"
breakthrough.scoring_text: Reveal: end of enemy activation. Remove 1 friendly Scheme Marker from within opponent's Deployment Zone with no enemy within 2"
breakthrough.additional_vp_text: Also remove 1 marker from Centerline AND 1 from your Deployment Zone

frame_job.name: Frame Job
frame_job.reveal_condition: Chosen model takes damage from an enemy attack action that targeted it while on enemy table half
frame_job.scoring_text: Reveal: when triggered. Chosen model takes damage from an enemy attack action that targeted it while on enemy table half
frame_job.additional_vp_text: Remove a friendly Scheme Marker from within 2" of chosen model at same time

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.setup_text: Choose a unique enemy model with half or more of its max health
assassinate.reveal_condition: Reduce chosen model to below half health
assassinate.scoring_text: Reveal: when triggered. Reduce chosen model to below half health
assassinate.additional_vp_text: Chosen model is killed this turn

scout_the_rooftops.name: Scout the Rooftops
scout_the_rooftops.reveal_condition: Remove 2 friendly Scheme Markers at elevation 2+, on different terrain pieces, not within 6" of your deployment zone, no enemies at same elevation within 2"
scout_the_rooftops.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Remove 2 friendly Scheme Markers at elevation 2+, on different terrain pieces, not within 6" of your deployment zone, no enemies at same elevation within 2"
scout_the_rooftops.additional_vp_text: Remove a 3rd marker meeting same criteria AND completely on enemy table half (can be same terrain piece as one other)

detonate_charges.name: Detonate Charges
detonate_charges.reveal_condition: Remove 2 friendly Scheme Markers from within 2" of enemy models
detonate_charges.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Remove 2 friendly Scheme Markers from within 2" of enemy models

ensnare.name: Ensnare
ensnare.reveal_condition: Remove 2 friendly Scheme Markers from within 2" of a unique enemy model
ensnare.scoring_text: Reveal: when enemy model ends activation. Remove 2 friendly Scheme Markers from within 2" of a unique enemy model
ensnare.additional_vp_text: Unique enemy is engaged by a friendly model of lower cost

make_it_look_like_an_accident.name: Make It Look Like an Accident
make_it_look_like_an_accident.scoring_text: Reveal: when triggered. Enemy model takes falling damage
make_it_look_like_an_accident.additional_vp_text: Kill that model OR reduce it to below half health

harness_the_ley_line.name: Harness the Leyline
harness_the_ley_line.reveal_condition: Have 2 friendly Scheme Markers on centerline, not within 6" of each other, no enemies within 2"
harness_the_ley_line.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Have 2 friendly Scheme Markers on centerline, not within 6" of each other, no enemies within 2"
harness_the_ley_line.additional_vp_text: Have 3 markers meeting the criteria instead of 2

search_the_area.name: Search the Area
search_the_area.reveal_condition: Remove 3 friendly Scheme Markers within 1" of same terrain piece completely on enemy half, no enemies within 2"
search_the_area.scoring_text: Reveal: end of activation. Remove 3 friendly Scheme Markers within 1" of same terrain piece completely on enemy half, no enemies within 2"
search_the_area.additional_vp_text: Have 1 friendly Scheme Marker next to that terrain

take_the_highground.name: Take the Highground
take_the_highground.reveal_condition: Control 2+ terrain pieces of Ht 2+, not within 6" of your deployment zone
take_the_highground.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Control 2+ terrain pieces of Ht 2+, not within 6" of your deployment zone
next_available_schemes: Make It Look Like An Accident

grave_robbing.name: Grave Robbing
grave_robbing.reveal_condition: Kill an enemy model within 2" of chosen marker type AND a friendly Scheme Marker
grave_robbing.scoring_text: Reveal: when triggered. Kill an enemy model within 2" of chosen marker type AND a friendly Scheme Marker
grave_robbing.additional_vp_text: After revealing, Interact twice to pick up Remains Markers onto crew card
next_available_schemes: Make It Look Like An Accident

runic_binding.name: Runic Binding
runic_binding.reveal_condition: Have 3 Scheme Markers forming triangle (each within 14" of at least one other), at least 1 enemy inside triangle
runic_binding.scoring_text: Reveal: end of enemy activation. Have 3 Scheme Markers forming triangle (each within 14" of at least one other), at least 1 enemy inside triangle
runic_binding.additional_vp_text: 15+ Soulstones worth of enemy models inside triangle

reshape_the_land.name: Reshape the Land
reshape_the_land.reveal_condition: Have 4 friendly markers of chosen type on enemy table half
reshape_the_land.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Have 4 friendly markers of chosen type on enemy table half

public_demonstration.name: Public Demonstration
public_demonstration.reveal_condition: Engage chosen unique enemy with 2+ friendly Minions
public_demonstration.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Engage chosen unique enemy with 2+ friendly Minions
public_demonstration.additional_vp_text: Have a Scheme Marker within 1" of chosen enemy

leave_your_mark.name: Leave Your Mark
leave_your_mark.reveal_condition: Have more friendly Scheme Markers within 1" of centerpoint than enemy markers
leave_your_mark.scoring_text: Reveal: end of turn. Have more friendly Scheme Markers within 1" of centerpoint than enemy markers
leave_your_mark.additional_vp_text: Exceed enemy marker count by 2 or more
next_available_schemes: Make It Look Like An Accident
